layer_background_visible: Using this function you can toggle a background elements visibility. You supply the background element ID (which you get when you create a background element using layer_background_create() or when you use the function layer_background_get_id()), and then set the visible argument to true or false. When set to true the element will be displayed, and when set to false, the element will not be displayed. Note that this is dependent on the layer visibility, and even if the background element is flagged as visible, it will not be drawn if the layer it is on is flagged as not visible.
The unique ID value of the background element to change
The visibility toggle, which can be <tt>true</tt> or <tt>false</tt>
